item.title: Project 1: Customer Segmentation
item.description: Problem Statement: A marketing department wishes to boost email campaign engagement by grouping or segmenting customers based on their purchasing behaviors. Solution Summary Four distinct customer segments have been identified using K-means clustering and UMAP 2D Projection. The four customer segments were described using the customerâ€™s most recent product purchases. Segment 1 Preferences: Road Bikes, Below $3200 (Economical Models) Segment 2 Preferences: Mountain Bikes, Above $3200 (Premium Models) Segment 3 Preferences: Road Bikes, Above $3200 (Premium Models) Segment 4 Preferences: Both Road and Mountain, Below $3200 (Economical Models) Customer Preferences
